body.p: CHEERUM UP CHARLEY B-J readers he feelum sad, Hear Charley Low Cloud feel bad. Charley say he had a flu,Make feel sorry his friend Cap too. All night taking care, Charley say fine nurse Keepum heap well, he no get worse. We hope Charley no stop Indian News, Good Indian Charley drive away blues. B-J folks say Charley much miss, Even Mose Paquette, and so say Chris. So figure him Cap drop Charley line, Hopem get well and soon feel fine. CAP WALLER
